name: Moonlight (itch) (Thomas Yvorel)
description:
In this cute arcade game, you need to help a witch to cast spells by drawing on his magic canvas, on the rythm of the lunar cycle.  But be careful : your magic pen can't draw endlessly, and you need to pay attention to how long are your lines. Try to have the best score ! 

One of the distinctive features of this game is also to be playable with both mouse and graphic tablet.

This game was made during a 48h Game Jam by Abrino Marie, Bourgeau Sohel and Yvorel Thomas.
